name: Pachirisu
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

attacks.name: Overshort
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tool cards from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. If you discarded a Pokémon Tool card in this way, this attack does 40 more damage, and your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
